headline: Devon Energy CEO: ‘Stars align’ to acquire Coterra for nearly $26 billion as merger mania returns to the oilfield
summary: The massive Permian Basin merger creates a combined Devon with a $58 billion enterprise value.

raw.headline: Devon Energy CEO: ‘Stars align’ to acquire Coterra for nearly $26 billion as merger mania returns to the oilfield
raw.summary: The massive Permian Basin merger creates a combined Devon with a $58 billion enterprise value.

headline: Devon Agrees to Buy Oil Rival Coterra for $21.4 Billion in Stock
summary: The deal calls for Coterra stockholders to receive 0.7 Devon shares for each share they own, according to a statement Monday.  The company will keep the Devon name, and Devon Chief Executive Officer Clay Gaspar will remain as CEO after the deal closes.  Bloomberg News first reported the talks earlier this year and revealed last week that a deal was near.

headline: Analyst Raises Diamondback Energy (FANG) Price Target to $218
summary: Diamondback Energy, Inc. (NASDAQ:FANG) is included among the 7 Best Low-Risk Dividend Stocks to Invest in. Diamondback Energy, Inc.
